title: Shiitake and the Sun
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Walking Shiitake is so relaxing, zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I know, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Though... It’s a bit chilly today. There’s a cold breeze coming in~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Fu, fu, fu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huh? What happened, Chika-chan? That was a weird laugh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That wasn’t a weird laugh. You know, I have a secret to keeping warm even on a cold day~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Going for a run?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>No, no! Hugging Shiitake! It’s super warm when you hug Shiitake after her fluffy fur has soaked up all the sunshine~ Why don’t you try, Hanamaru-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Okay... Ahhhh~ This is like heaven, zura~ I want to keep my face buried in Shiitake all day...... Shiitake and the sunshine combined smell great, zura...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahh~, I can’t stop myself~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
